ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mndidcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | mndidcl.o | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_mndid | |- ( G e. Mnd -> E. x e. B A. y e. B ( ( x ( +g ` G ) y ) = y /\ ( y ( +g ` G ) x ) = y ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_mgmidcl | |- ( G e. Mnd -> .0. e. B ) |
